title: Kidnapped
brief_description: Based on the story by Robert Louis Stevenson, the film follows the adventures of David Balfour (James Macarthur) and his heroic attempts to regain his inherited property - the house and lands of the Shaws in Scotland. Cast includes John McIntyre, Peter Finch and Miles Malleson.
